long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sortabli is our patent-pending email urgency indication tool designed to streamline and prioritize your email communications.

Sortabli empowers you to effortlessly organize and prioritize your emails. Assign an urgency indicator to every email you send, signaling to your recipient the level of urgency and when a response is needed. 

Recipients can then prioritize their inbox based on these indicators, ensuring that the most critical messages get the attention they deserve.

Its like a traffic light for your inbox - green for 'read whenever', amber for 'can wait', and red for 'drop everything!' 

So next time you log into your email, you can be sure on which emails to respond first!

We charge $0.99 a month to help us maintain the app and its capabilities
